gaza.title: Please help 🍉
description: Taking action against the genocide of the Palestinian people does not make you antisemitic or pro-Hamas.
If you can't afford giving money, sharing following links with your viewers is as important 💖
gaza.araborg_head: Just click a button every day
gaza.araborg_message: 💖🍉 1 free click per day to help =>
